name: vid
description: Transaction ID for which prediction was done (unique JOIN key)

name: banks
description: Banks list for which model was trained.

name: training_dt
description: Model training date (Europe/Zurich) as INT (YYYYMMDDhhmmss). To build saved model path in order to load the model during prediction.

name: vectorizer_cn
description: Vecorizer class name used for feature engineering.
